title: Vivid Sydney 2025
description: Experience the largest festival of light, music, and ideas in the Southern Hemisphere.

title: Sydney Comedy Festival
description: Laugh out loud with international and local comedians performing across the city.

title: Glass Island - Red Room
description: Enjoy a sunset cruise with world-class entertainment and 360° views.

title: Sydney Writers' Festival
description: One of Australia's largest literary festivals featuring authors, thinkers, and storytellers from around the globe.

title: Opera on Sydney Harbour: La Bohème
description: A magical outdoor opera experience under the stars with breathtaking views of Sydney’s skyline.

title: Sydney Dance Festival
description: A celebration of dance from around the world — workshops, showcases, and competitions.

title: Harbour Music Cruise
description: An exclusive evening cruise with live DJs, gourmet food, and panoramic views of the harbour.
